Body:
"""
    unity test for SIW object
    """
wr1 = wg.SIW(COPPER, D5880, 0.0024)
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    wr1.calc_pphc(29000000000.0, 3500000.0)
wr1.set_width(0.0071)
assert round(wr1.f_c) == 14233805208
wr1.set_fc(17000000000.0)
assert round(1000 * wr1.width, 2) == 5.94
assert round(wr1.calc_a_d(20000000000.0), 4) == 0.0461
assert round(wr1.calc_a_c(20000000000.0), 6) == 0.004997
assert round(wr1.calc_ksr(20000000000.0), 6) == 1
assert round(wr1.calc_lambda(20000000000.0), 6) == 0.028455
wr1.diel.rougthness = 0
with pytest.raises(ValueError):
    wr1.calc_ksr(20000000000.0)
wr1.diel.rougthness = 0.0009
assert round(wr1.calc_pphc(29000000000.0, 3500000.0)) == 139370
wr1.print_info()
assert round(wr1.get_sparam(20000000000.0, 0.01), 2) == -0.99 + 0.13j
